DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective is to establish the concurrent validity of the clinician administered Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder-Rating Scale (ADHD-RS) and the patient administered Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder Self Report Scale (ASRS) v1.1 Symptom Checklist.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Self and Clinician Administered Rating Scales in Patients With ADHD
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of ADHD Age 1365* *Parental consent and patient's assent will be obtained for minors participating in this protocol (only adolescents aged 1318 yrs old will be included in the MGH site) Inability to reliably report ADHD symptoms at the discretion of the investigator
